title: Intelligent connected vehicles highlight conference in Beijing
text:
Visitors check out the features on the dashboard of a BYD vehicle at the World Intelligent Connected Vehicles conference in Beijing on Oct 23, 2019. [Photo/VCG]

Intelligent connected vehicles highlighted the ongoing World Intelligent Connected Vehicles conference in Beijing.

Themed "Jointly Building an Ecosystem to Lead a Smart Future-Ushering in a New Era of Automobiles", the conference attracted 200 companies from home and abroad.

These companies brought many cutting-edging technologies and the latest research and development achievements, including 5G technology and intelligent transportation.

The conference, running from Tuesday to Friday, was organized by five departments, including the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, and Beijing Municipal Government.
description: Intelligent connected vehicles highlighted the ongoing World Intelligent Connected Vehicles conference in Beijing.
